title: Johan Bernhardsson明天将离开Mojang
author: pca006132
txt_content:
本帖最后由 pca006132 于 2015-9-13 12:33 编辑 
Johan Bernhardsson:Today was my last day at Mojang. I have moved to Malm? and will keep making games. Maybe not as big as Minecraft. :)
今天是我在Mojang的最后一天。我已经搬到马尔默也会继续制作游戏。可能不会是Minecraft那样大的游戏。:)Johan Bernhardsson:It has been amazing working at Mojang and on Minecraft. You guys are great! :)
在Mojang工作和制作Minecraft真是十分好。你们所有人都很好！:)
Dinnerbone:Good luck with your new adventures, @jbernhardsson. You will be missed!
祝你之后的日子好运，@jbernhardsson(Johan Bernhardsson)。大家会想念你的！


Johan Bernhardsson的推特： https://twitter.com/jbernhardsson



注：Johan Bernhardsson在Mojang的主要工作内容为OS X启动器与PE版
他不是Jeb!(╯‵□′)╯︵┻━━━┻

[groupid=546]Command Block Logic[/groupid]
